function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential security incidents due to data exchange","Impact":"Compromise of sensitive information and data integrity","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption and security measures","Technologies":"Encryption, blockchain","People":"Data administrators, institutions","Owner":"IT department, data security team"},{"Description":"Impact of crises such as COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to understand and respond to the level of impacts","Mitigation":"Use of baseline databases and timely data-informed decisions","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, urban observatories","People":"Policy makers, disaster response teams","Owner":"Urban observatory administrators"},{"Description":"Coordination and collaboration challenges in different contexts","Impact":"Lack of collaboration and integrated governance","Mitigation":"Development of urban observatories and innovative technologies","Technologies":"Blockchain, integrated communication systems","People":"Urban governance authorities, city officials","Owner":"Urban planning departments"}]}
